SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn , a.* FROM ( select p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_contents, bu.cd_contents as unitName, bt.cd_contents as typeName, bi.cd_contents as isorderName from product p left join bunryu bu on p.product_unit = bu.mcd and bu.bcd = 750 left join bunryu bt on p.product_type = bt.mcd and bt.bcd = 700 left join bunryu bi on p.product_isorder = bi.mcd and bi.bcd = 800 order by p.product_code)a ) WHERE rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
